column4: i replaced the firefox1.5 folder with new ver of firefox 2.0 in the root..... but now i'm not able to run firefox.... can anyone help me???
Flannel:now i'm not able to open firefox.......
use w3m, it's textmode, but will get you there

w3m [url] 
2007-02-18T17:30:00.000Z	Flannel	novice	er, without the quote
2007-02-18T17:34:00.000Z	Flannel	novice	er, really?  thats odd.  is that the only error you get?
2007-02-18T17:34:00.000Z	novice	Flannel	yup
2007-02-18T17:35:00.000Z	Flannel	novice	what command did you give it, exactly?
2007-02-18T17:36:00.000Z	novice	Flannel	now i gave w3m <url>
2007-02-18T17:36:00.000Z	Flannel	novice	very odd indeed.
2007-02-18T17:37:00.000Z	Flannel	novice	Well, I wish we had more information on why it wasn't working.  My initial response would be install another browser (lynx or whatever) and try that
2007-02-18T17:38:00.000Z	novice	Flannel	where can i find the other browsers
2007-02-18T17:38:00.000Z	Flannel	novice	the repositories
2007-02-18T17:38:00.000Z	novice	Flannel	shld i search in synaptic...??
2007-02-18T17:38:00.000Z	Flannel	novice	oh, dillo is a good one, it'll be graphical
2007-02-18T17:38:00.000Z	novice	Flannel	k..... thanx..... i will try
